title: Participant Data Column Description
description: The metadata of a single column of a participant data description

id.description: The unique generated ID assigned to new columns

participantDataDescriptorId.description: The ID of the participant data description this column belongs to

name.description: The display name of the column

description.description: An optional description of the column

type.description: The ui type to use to handle this data item

defaultValue.description: The optional default value of this column.

columnType.description: The type of the column must be from this enumeration.
columnType.name: ParticipantDataColumnType
